title: India Considers Fighting Poverty With a Universal Basic Income - India Real Time - WSJ
text: India Real Time India Considers Fighting Poverty With a Universal Basic Income Annual economic survey looks at possibility of replacing messy welfare programs with a stipend paid to every Indian ENLARGE A man carried a bundle of dried wood on his head in Fateh Nagla, Uttar Pradesh, India, Jan. 14, 2017. Photo: Prashanth Vishwanathan/Bloomberg News By
